sentences.en: There is a book on the desk. (variant 1)
There's a book on the table. (variant 2)

There are two windows in this room. (variant 2)

There are pupils in the class. (variant 2)

There isn't any food on the table. (variant 2)
There are toys in the box. (variant 1)
There are toys inside the box. (variant 2)
